attributes.review: Hello this is Melania, the First Lady of this glorious country I now call home, after I was coerced by the sweet idea of money🤑, fame, and the ability to leave the low opportunity ( for women) country I was born in. In the beginning Donald was a real doll 🧟‍♀️ he sent me gifts, called me baby and his tiny hands couldn’t squeeze too hard before giving out if you know what I mean :3 so all in all life was not too bad. EVERYTHING CHANGED when I downloaded this app in hopes that supporting my husband would tire his ego out during the day 😴so he’d leave me alone at night 🤮but none of that happened, instead my phone got hacked, it flew away at night all by itself and crossed ocean waters to reach my hole town where it self destructed because it couldn’t handle the pressure of my dear husbands MANY sexual assault charges, racist narcissistic tendencies, and worst of all. The ghetto dust that once powered out great president that was now oozing out of every whole in my phone! Finally it had had enough! It landed on the head of my life size statute in Slovenia and cried away all that Cheeto dusk, covered in highly toxic and therefore flammable Trump chemicals, THIS APP gave one last hurrah! And farted away causing my statute to burst into flames!!! How terrible is that! I had no idea this would happen😭😭😭and now there’s no choice but to erase this TERRIBLE APP because it has caused me great pain and somehow worsened my husbands rationality scale, I didn’t think it could go any lower but now after spending days on this app on HIS 📱 he’s been whispering under his breath Constantly! Something about little baby snowflakes and how he must destroy all the children! 😨😨 Im starting to worry a bit but I LOVE HIM so I will always stand with his mutating hair-dos and complete utter LACK of sex appeal. I still love him 💜💜💜 but please if there’s one wish I do have. APP STORE DELETE THIS APP ASAP! It is not worth the life’s of innocent children or the sanity of our greatest leader to date. 😡
attributes.title: Never thought this would happen

attributes.review: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. the bee, of course, flies anyway because bees don’t care what humans think is impossible. yellow, black. yellow, black. yellow, black. yellow, black. ooh, black and yellow! let’s shake it up a little. barry! breakfast is ready! coming! hang on a second. hello? barry? adam? can you believe this is happening? i cant. i’ll pick you up. looking sharp. use the stairs. your father paid good money for those. sorry. i’m excited. here’s the graduate. we’re very proud of you, son. a perfect report card, all B’s. very proud. ma! i got a thing going here. you got lint on your fuz. ow! that’s me! wave to us! we’ll be in row 118,000. bye! barry, i told you to stop flying in the house! hey adam. hey barry. is that fuzz gel? a little. special day, graduation. never thought i’d make it. three days grade school, theee days high school. those were awkward. three days college. i’m glad i took a day and hitchhiked around the hive. you did come back different. hi barry. artie, growing a mustache? looks good. hear about frankie? yeah. you going to the funeral? no i’m not going. everybody knows, sting someone, you die. don’t waste it on a squirrel. such a hothead. i guess he could have just gotten out of the way. i love this incorporating an amusement park into our day. that’s why we don’t need vacations. boy, quite a bit of pomp... under the circumstances. well adam today we are men. we are! bee men. amen! hallelujah! students, faculty, distinguished bees, please welcome dean buzzwell. welcome new hive city graduating class of...9:15. that concludes our ceremonies. and begins your career at honex industries! will we pick our job today? i heard it’s just orientation. heads up! here we go. keep your hands and feet inside the tram at all times. wonder what it’ll be like? a little scary. welcome to honex, a division of honesco and a part of the hexagon group. this is it! wow. wow. we know that you, as a bee, have worked your whole life to get to the point where you can work for your whole life.
attributes.title: I wanted to use this app but i had to marry my boyfriend who’s a bee

attributes.review: Gave me and my phone trauma now My phone and I need therapy 10/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP
attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: worst app ever. made my microwave light on fire?!?!? made my dining table go berserk??!?!? i don’t know what this app is for, probably idiotic stuff, but it’s making my house blow a casket 😎😜
